title: 8-gatsu no Symphony: Shibuya 2002-2003 (Symphony in August)
synopsis: Based on the autobiography of the singer Kawashima Ai. The name of the book is "Saigo no Kotoba" ("The Last Words") and it follows Kawashima Ai's life after her mother's death.
staff: [['Nishizawa, Akio', ['Director', ' Screenplay']], ['Shioya, Yoku', ['Sound Director']], ['Kawashima, Ai', ['Original Creator']], ['Aihara, Satoshi', ['Editing']]]
